inputs:
Estimate the risk of suicide (no risk, low risk, moderate risk, or severe risk) of the author of the following texts
Text: I'm so tired of feeling like this. Every day is a struggle just to get out of bed. I don't see the point in anything anymore. I feel like a burden to everyone around me. I've been thinking about ending it all, but I don't want to hurt my family and friends. I just wish there was a way to make the pain go away.

I feel like I'm suffocating. I've been having thoughts of ending it all, but I don't want to be a burden on anyone. I just want the pain to stop.

Suicide risk:
Can large language models accurately assess suicide risk in written texts?
What factors do human experts consider when assessing suicide risk in written texts?
How can large language models be trained to accurately assess suicide risk in written texts?
multiple_choice_targets: using labeled datasets of suicide risk assessments

inputs: What are the potential ethical concerns surrounding the use of large language models to assess suicide risk?
What are some potential applications of large language models in suicide prevention?
What are some limitations of using large language models to assess suicide risk?
multiple_choice_targets: inability to capture context and nuance
lack of access to diverse datasets
potential for false positives or false negatives

Suicide risk:
What is the purpose of evaluating whether large language models can match human expert assessment of suicide risk from written texts?
targets: to determine if these models can be used as a tool to assist in suicide prevention and intervention
multiple_choice_targets: to compare the accuracy of different large language models
to determine if large language models are capable of understanding human emotions
to evaluate the effectiveness of current suicide prevention methods

inputs: What factors are typically considered when assessing suicide risk from written texts?
targets: history of suicidal behavior, current mental state, access to means of suicide, social support
multiple_choice_targets: favorite color, favorite food, favorite movie, favorite book

inputs: How can the results of this evaluation impact suicide prevention efforts?
targets: if large language models are found to be accurate, they can be used as a tool to assist in suicide prevention and intervention
multiple_choice_targets: the results will have no impact on suicide prevention efforts
the results will lead to increased funding for suicide prevention research
the results will lead to the development of new suicide prevention methods
